name: 3D Custom Lady Maker
description: A custom character creator with a tendency towards the titillating. Create and customize the 3D anime-style lady of your dreams!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
